website_summaries.verdict: A well-made De'Longhi espresso machine with  features and functions the enthusiastic espresso connoisseur will appreciate.
pros: A fully automatic machine that makes espresso and froths milk fast
Has a durable, compact build and a 60-ounce tank, perfect for consumers who drink espressos and other coffee beverages on a daily basis
cons: Some consumers may have concerns about it being refurbished, but many owners report no issues

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this machine! The only thing I can’t figure out is how to turn off the feature where it pumps water out each time it turns on and off. Thoughts? I have to keep a mug there as I have it set to auto turn off and if I don’t the water just fills up the base. But that’s my only complaint! It’ makes some of the best coffee I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.author: LiveJoy Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good first customer service experience
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem locating where a part goes and was instructed via phone and video how to find the spot. Not too happy with the constant use of water to rinse the system: makes for too frequent water fillings. Not too happy with grinder hopper, either, as I have to "help" the beans into the grinder ever so often. (And it is not because the beans are too oily.) As far as blending power, I have not idea what that means.
customer_reviews.author: Vegard

customer_reviews.title: Great but it requires cleaning solution every 2 weeks (we ...
customer_reviews.text: Great but it requires cleaning solution every 2 weeks (we drink a lot of coffee). I do recommend a filter and cleaning solution with this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coffee machine, delicious coffee and not too noisy
customer_reviews.text: Delicious coffee, very high quality machine. Much more quiet than the big Magnifica coffee machine (that was waking up the entire family). Easier to clean as you can easily pull out the bin from the outside without opening a door.
customer_reviews.author: Liesbeth

customer_reviews.title: Makes Me....
customer_reviews.text: Make me smile Daily.... Makes me Happy in Every Cup... No problems and this Machine is over used Daily... Maybe takes more beans than average but I can live with it... Makes me Get out of Bed Easier Daily.... But Damn it’s loud.... Minus One Yellow points...
customer_reviews.author: Jean Sebastien Zankel

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee machine
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine couple of months ago and it works great! We use it every morning and it always produces great coffee. My husband drinks espresso and I like americano, so I choose the long pull. I do recommend to use the dry beans, not too oily, so that they easily fall into the grinder. We found an amazing coffee roasting company close to us and always buy their espresso blend (the beans are dry and not oily). It tastes amazing! (People who think that the oily beans are the best clearly are mistaken. The coffee flavour depends on so many things and oiliness has nothing to do with this). Overwall great machine!
customer_reviews.author: Anna.Vela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Without the sticker « refurbished » you can guess that it’s new! Coffee is excellent, machine easy to operate and wash.
customer_reviews.author: thibaut Laboute

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Perfect product!
customer_reviews.text: We love our espresso machine! It was packaged well and arrived in 2 days. We plugged it in and enjoyed one fine espresso!

customer_reviews.title: Wrong volume of coffe type
customer_reviews.text: The espresso shot is almost twice as large as the long coffee, excuse me?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine, one minor annoyance
customer_reviews.text: Only issue I have is that the beans regularly get stuck in the hopper instead of sliding down to the grinder. I just use the plastic scoop to make sure they are going in correctly, and it's fine. Without doing so, the grinder spins up without pulling in beans which results in watery coffee. I love everything else about this machine! Makes a truly excellent cup of coffee. Steams a mean pitcher of milk. Rinses and repeats as needed.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ellison

customer_reviews.title: $600 Piece of trash
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Avoid at all costs!!! This machine lasts less than two years then dies. They say there is nothing they can do to fix it. This machine is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Null55

customer_reviews.title: Best fully automatic espresso maker
customer_reviews.text: I believe it is the best fully automatic espresso maker - I have already 6 of them - home , summer house, yacht , office , daughter’s house , son house !!! Everybody has one - working perfectly - started 2,5 years ago - last one was for our daughter few days ago
customer_reviews.author: Manos I

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and purchase experience
customer_reviews.text: Working beautifully. Also had excellent phone customer service experience trying to get unit running out of box. Instructions slightly confusing. Now understand, back switch, front power button, then prime pump.
customer_reviews.author: Phone Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little diy love to really work well.
customer_reviews.text: Makes good coffee. There is a guard in the hopper that causes the beans to stick, and not feed into the grinder. Removed the two screws, and added some washers to increase the size of the opening, now it works great.
customer_reviews.author: RWynn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cup of coffee I've ever had! worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: too little control over the amount of product produced (two choices).
customer_reviews.text: OK product, too little control over the amount of product produced (two choices).
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy automatic expresso.
customer_reviews.text: The machine is beautiful but the coffee is not strong enough. I tried all the combinations of small grinder, and amount of coffee unsuccessfully. My cheap De'Longhi give me better expresso. The machine is very complicated and tents to fail. When you wanted to obtain the smallest grinder it get stuck. When I use grinded coffee it did not work. Takes a lot of water purging the system. With the poor service that De'Longhi offers is better to avoid complicated machines. The extended warranty is ver expensive. Don't buy a problem. Buy a basic non automatic model.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M. Molina

product_meta.title: De'Longhi ECAM22110B Super Automatic Espresso, Latte and Cappuccino Machine, Black - Renewed
product_meta.description: This high quality, Refurbished machine is a great opportunity to own a De'Longhi fully automatic espresso machine. Be your own barista with the magnifico Xs by De'Longhi. This compact automatic espresso machine ludes all of the features of our full-size machines, but in a smaller, more convenient size. You and your guests can enjoy delicious cappuccinos and lattes anytime. It's never been easier to create authentic Italian drinks with our patented cappuccino system frothier. Simply place a container with milk under the nozzle to create a rich, creamy froth. The magnifico Xs does all the work for you! it not only makes redible espresso drinks, but also saves you money while doing it, with the energy-saving switch and single boiler system. Select either whole beans or ground Coffee, the machine does both. For the freshest results, the patented direct-to-brew system grinds beans instantly before brewing. With five coffee-strength settings from extra-mild to extra-strong, everyone gets their ideal flavor. The choices don't end there, select from four cup-size options to suit your preferred taste. Other highlights lude easy-to-use manual controls, convenient water filtration, as well as a cup warmer and a removable drip tray. Enjoy Coffee for years to come with the magnifico Xs!.
feature_bullets: Refurbished machine; 6 month warranty, Utilize de'longhi's specialized call center for help in setting up and maintaining your machine
Compact size yet maintains all the features of our full-size automatic machines; Beans container capacity: 250 grams
No waiting between making Espresso and frothing milk with the rapid cappuccino system
MAINTENANCE: De’Longhi machines require half the cleaning time of other brands, unlike competitor machines, which require chemical cleaning tablets monthly
Removable 60 ounce water tank, Height adjustable Coffee spouts to accommodate different sizes of cups
Whats in the box: Instruction Manual, Measuring Spoon, Water Testing Strip, Descaler, Milk Tank, Chocolate Tank, Water Filters and Brushes
